body.p: Chuck Norris wrote a complete Perl 6 implementation in a day, but then destroyed all evidence with his bare hands, so no-one will know his secrets.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish

body.p: Chuck Norris refactors 10 million lines of Perl code before lunch.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish

body.p: Chuck Norris is his own boss. If you hire him, he'll tell your boss what to do.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish

body.p: Chuck Norris read the entire English Wikipedia in 24 hours. Twice.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish

body.p: Chuck Norris does not code; when he sits at a computer, it just does whatever he wants. (By: Kattana.)

info.author: Kattana
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris commits with a roundhouse kick into the SVN server's head.

info.author: Daxim
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris doesn't make mistakes. (Su-Shee)
He corrects God. (Shlomi Fish)

info.author: Su-Shee and Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is the ghost author of the entire Debian GNU/Linux distribution. And he wrote it in 24 hours, while taking snack breaks.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris doesn't commit changes, the changes commit for him.

info.author: Araujo
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Bugs are too afraid to reproduce on Chuck Norris' computer. As a result, when he uses Microsoft Windows, it behaves just like a Linux system.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is a real programmer. He writes programs by implementing the most optimised machines for them using real atoms.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Deletionists delete Wikipedia articles that they consider lame.
Chuck Norris deletes Deletionists whom he considers lame.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: There are no deletionists. Only Wikipedia articles Chuck Norris allows to live. (By: joeyadams)

info.author: joeyadams
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Wikipedia deletionists don't delete lame Wikipedia articles. Chuck Norris deletes lame Wikipedia articles.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: No one knows all of Perl - not even Larry Wall. Except Chuck Norris, who knows all of Perl 5, Perl 6 and can answer questions about the design of Perl 7.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris reads all messages posted to LKML (= the Linux Kernel Mailing List), understands them all, and he kills all gnomes he sees in sight.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris uses Gentoo, "emerge kde" finishes in under a minute. A computer cannot afford to keep Chuck waiting for too long.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is the greatest man in history. He killed all the great men who could ever pose a competition.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: "My only boss is God. And Chuck Norris who is his boss."

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can make the statement "This statement is false." a true one.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can end world hunger, but he thinks that hungry people make humanity a more challenging adversary. If everyone had enough to eat, it would be too easy for him.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can read Perl code that was RSA encrypted.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris once wrote a 10 million lines C++ program in Microsoft Notepad without having to use the backspace key. And it compiled without errors or warnings, and was 100% bug-free.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If the mountain will not come to Muhammad, then Muhammad will go to the mountain. If the mountain will not come to Chuck Norris, then the mountain will suffer Norris’s wrath for not complying with his whims.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris has 0 messages in his E-mail inbox. Including already read ones.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris was never a newbie! He will kill anyone who implies otherwise. In a very not newbie-like manner.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Only perl and Chuck Norris can parse Perl.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: All Chuck Norris has to do is *look* at Perl code and it interprets itself out of fear and respect.

info.author: DrForr
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris taught God how to create the universe.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is the reason why the Knights who until Recently Said “Ni”, are no longer saying “Ni”.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Dov and Shlomi Fish’s Chuck Norris Fact #31

body.p: Chuck Norris is not afraid of superstitions. Superstitions are afraid of Chuck Norris.

info.author: Dov and Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does expect the Spanish Inquisition.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The Spanish Inquisition does not expect Chuck Norris.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: A wood chuck can’t chuck wood. Chuck Norris can chuck wood chucks.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If Chuck Norris asks you “What's up?” and you answer it literally, then he will club you senseless with all the volumes of the Oxford English Dictionary, and all the servers hosting en.wiktionary.org, to teach you a lesson.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris helps the gods that help themselves.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If Chuck Norris had been born before World War II, there would have been only one world war. However, there would have been three largescale Chuck Norris masacares of Nazis and Communists.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If the mountain does not come to Muhammad, then Chuck Norris will bring the mountain over.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: An apple a day will keep Chuck Norris away. But not for long.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Reality to be conquered must be obeyed. You’d better obey Chuck Norris or he’ll conquer you.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris had a problem so he decided to use regular expressions. Now, all the World’s problems are solved.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: A is A and A is not not-A — unless Chuck Norris says so.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can make East and West meet.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris orders Pizza, it arrives before he presses the OK button.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does not need to heat up food. The food is already warm right after he took it out of the fridge.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck’s idea of a short walk is to the Andromeda Galaxy and back.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris hasn't taken these facts down yet, so they must be true.

info.author: Cantide
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: For every A, Chuck Norris is both A and not-A. Chuck Norris is fucking everything.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Tomorrow never dies, unless Chuck Norris volunteers to take it out of its misery

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: God created the world in 6 days and rested on the 7th. Chuck Norris created the world in one day, and has been incrementally destroying it every day since, without rest.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is always right. Even if he says that “A is not-A”, he would be right, because Logic is subject to his whims.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does not own a dishwasher. His dishes know better than to become dirty.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The Angel of Death cannot keep up with Chuck Norris’s throughput of killing.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Computers are useless because they can only give you answers. Chuck Norris is not useless, because he knows the questions which these answers belong to.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is Vito Corleone’s godfather.

info.author: ZadYree
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris will kill everyone who has not read these factoids. Slowly and painfully.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris could have built the Roman Empire in a day. And it would have taken him even less time to destroy it.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris once counted all the real numbers on his fingers.

info.author: ZadYree
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Only two things are infinite: the universe, and Chuck Norris’s destruction ability. And we cannot be sure about the former thanks to the latter.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris knows who John Galt is.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris won the Nobel Peace Prize. For making millions of people rest in peace.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris uses git, he takes a coffee break after initiating every git commit. And then he waits for the commit to finish.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: God is Chuck Norris, for extremely large values of God.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can become root on OpenBSD. By using nothing but /bin/echo.

info.author: ZadYree and Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris is the reason why OpenBSD is called OpenBSD. They wanted to call it LockedDownBSD but couldn't find a way to keep Chuck Norris out!

info.author: Andrew Brehm
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: For all you know, you may not exist, and Chuck Norris convinced you that you do.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris wrote an interpreter for a Turing-complete language using only NOPs.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does not keep any numbers on his mobile phone’s address book. Instead, he memorised the entire phone directory.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris drops a cat, it falls on its back so it won’t lose eye contact with Chuck.
Corroloary: If Chuck Norris had dropped his toasts, they would have fallen on the dry side, so they would have stayed on his good side. But Chuck Norris never drops toasts.

info.author: Shlomi Fish and ZadYree
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can solve MS Freecell deal No. 11,982. With Zero Freecells.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris once solved 100 million deals of Freecell in a minute. By hand.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: After Chuck Norris said “I don’t believe in fairies.”, fairies have become extinct.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris caught the early bird before she caught the worm.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can make one baby in a month using nine mothers.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris helps God help those that help themselves.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: God ties Chuck Norris’ camel.

info.author: Shlomi Fish and ZadYree
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can convince everyone that the colour of the bikeshed should be his favourite colour.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris finished building the bike-shed by the time people stopped arguing what its colour should be.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris’ E-mails are signed with “Sent using Chuck Norris’ brain (which he can also kill you using it).”.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris receives an E-mail signed “Sent from my iPhone”, he makes sure that iPhone won’t be able to send any more E-mails — to Norris or otherwise.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris wrote a program in Python that was easier to understand after being encrypted with RSA.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When Chuck Norris disses your product, it’s not good publicity, even though you can bet he’ll get the name right.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris knows if you’re a dog on the Internet.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris was the 1,000,000,000th viewer of the Gangnam Style video on YouTube.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris used these facts to his advantage, making a huge comeback. He didn’t get mad — he got even!

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris has 99 problems including a bitch.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If Chuck Norris travelled to the market with his son and his donkey, he would have clubbed the critics to death. With the donkey.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can construct any logical expression using only AND gates.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can neither confirm nor deny that he was the Alpha Male. But he’ll kill you if you say he wasn't.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does not boil up water. If he wants, his ice cubes boil water, instead of making it cooler.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris wrote the entire tvtropes.org wiki, so he can sleep with your significant other while you are distracted reading it.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck norris can edit Wikipedia super protected pages. Anonymously.

info.author: ponie
info.work: Chuck Norris Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: In Soviet Russia, superstition believes in you.

info.author: Sawyer X
info.work: Post to the Israeli Perl Mongers List

body.p: In Soviet Russia, cats own you. No, wait! Cats own you everywhere.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: In Soviet Russia, joke is tired of you.

info.author: apeiron
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: In Soviet Russia, food tastes YOU!

info.author: Leuthihi
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: In Soviet Russia, government is afraid of you!

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: In Soviet Russia, meme uses You!

info.author: Volis
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: In Soviet Russia, garbage collects you.

info.author: mucker
info.work: “In Soviet Russia” Factoids

body.p: Buffy will always find a wooden stake to slay vampires, even if it means she will have travelled 100 years back in time, to plant a tree nearby.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Buffy Summers does not really need stakes to slay vampires, because her kisses are deadly for them. And that includes those that she blows in the air.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The Chuck Norris of the Buffyverse, has been secretly training under Buffy’s supervision, and so far — lost every battle with her.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Buffy is so hot, that you would totally love to fight her. And lose.

info.author: Dan Dascalescu
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Buffy Summers is not afraid of demons. Demons are afraid of her. And for a very good reason.

info.author: Dov Levenglick and Shlomi Fish
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Medusa’s gaze can turn people into stone. Buffy’s gaze can turn Medusa into stone.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Buffy Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Clarissa Darling can start from “I think therefore I am” and prove that the grass is green, that there are about 365 days in a year, and that Isaac Newton formulated the Law of Gravitation back in 1687.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Clarissa Darling Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Gödel’s Incompleteness Theorem is about to be replaced by the [Clarissa] Darling “Like, Totally!” Completeness Theorem.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Clarissa Darling Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Clarissa Darling will win over Chuck Norris in a battle of wits.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Clarissa Darling Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Playing Hermione in the Harry Potter films was a dirty job, but Emma Watson got a shitload of money and worldwide recognition for doing it.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Emma Watson is not acting in films for money. She is acting in films for a shitload of money.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If the miller had travelled to the market with Emma, they would have each rode their own donkey. Problem solved.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Emma Watson is not perfect, but she's really good at hiding her imperfections.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Emma Watson may not look too menacing with a wand in her hand. Until she uses it with great accuracy to poke both your eyes out.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: If the mountain does not come to Emma Watson, she won’t bother visiting it. It would be the mountain’s loss, really.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Emma Watson does not have 10 years of experience in developing Enterprise Java software. However, she has over 10 years of experience in getting shit done - well, on schedule, and at a reasonable cost.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Fluttershy immediately stops crying when Emma Watson comes to visit her.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Emma Watson and you would make the best children. She'll provide the talent, good looks, and brains, while you provide the sperm. (Via Connor Pollock.)

info.author: Connor Pollock
info.work: Emma Watson Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

ul.li: Larry Wall can understand the Perl code he wrote last year.
There are at least 137 Larry Walls in the U.S. but only one that matters.
Larry Wall applies a patch manually quicker than GNU patch.
Larry Wall can program in his sleep.
Larry Wall is lazy, impatient and full of hubris.
Larry Wall has more dollars in the bank than in his Perl code.

body.p: -- Larry Wall facts by Shlomi Fish

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Shlomif Fish’s "Larry Wall Facts"

ul.li: Larry Wall does know all of Perl. However, he pretends to be wrong or misinformed, so people will think he's not as awesome as he really is.
Larry Wall's pure-Perl code is faster than Assembly.
Larry Wall has been changing the world. By modifying its very source code.

body.p: -- Larry Wall facts by Shlomi Fish

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Shlomif Fish’s "Larry Wall Facts"

ul.li: Larry Wall can make shit up, and the computer will understand what he means.

body.p: -- Larry Wall facts by Shlomi Fish

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Shlomif Fish’s “Larry Wall Facts”

body.p: The NSA don’t publish. They perish.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The NSA employs the largest number of mathematicians with Ph.Ds. And the most stupid and incompetent ones.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The NSA has a patent for an efficient process for collecting a lot of information and doing nothing with it.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The Bajoran scholars have positively identified Benjamin Sisko as The Emissary. They also positively identified the NSA headquarters as The Dungeon.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: One of Buffy the Vampire Slayer’s episodes took place in the NSA headquarters, but had to be destroyed, because all of the test audience had uncontrollable panic attacks.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The NSA knows what you did last summer. But no one, in the NSA or outside it, knows why they should.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: With the NSA’s budget you would expect evil to be extinct by now. (By Kika).

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Think of the most incompetent organisation possible. The NSA would be more even more incompetent than that.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The NSA headquarters are the unhappiest place on Earth.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Yogurt: “Never overestimate the power of the NSA.”

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: First the NSA ignores “silly” Internet memes, then they laugh at them, then they are unable to fight them, and then they lose.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: The NSA is an intelligence agency which thinks it can use Artificial Ultra-Stupidity (AUS) to wade through tons of irrelevant information and reach genuine understanding.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Your next job after one in @NSACareers, will be as a dead corpse in a coffin, 6 feet underground, or as a patient in a psychiatric ward.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Hackers bend the rules, so the NSA hates them. Instead, the NSA accumulates rules, observes them, and accepts their fate: death.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: NSA Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can only convince you that you're deceased. Summer Glau can also convince you that you're alive, which is much harder.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau can hold and use a gun in each hand. There's no way that Jennifer Lawrence can hold and use a bow in each hand.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau does not have to hurt you if she doesn't want to . Chuck Norris kills everyone in sight.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau has better ways to make a difference than by being violent.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: It takes Summer Glau exactly a minute to write a rebuttal like in xkcd: “Venting”, and she would sign it as Chuck Norris.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris ability to destroy is only matched (and exceeded) by Summer Glau’s ability to undo his destruction.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Whatever Chuck Norris taketh, Summer Glau giveth back.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau can lead a horse to water, and then it will drink out of its own volition.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris was the 1,000,000,000th viewer of the Gangnam Style video on YouTube. Summer Glau was the preceding 100 million views.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau can restore the people that Chuck killed, back to life.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau can give you the Hug of Death, but you’ll die happy.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When it comes to terminators, you have a better shot at Arnold Schwarzenegger than at Summer Glau. (By inspiration from the Big Bang Theory episode with Glau as herself.)

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris has 99 problems including a bitch. Summer Glau has exactly 98 problems.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris can construct any logical expression using only AND gates. Summer Glau can replace Chuck with a very small AND gate.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Who would win in a fight? Charlemagne, Charles Dickens, Charles Darwin or Carlos "Chuck" Norris? If Summer Glau was the arbiter, she would just kill all of them and declare herself the winner.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris round house kicks doors open instead of using their keys. Summer Glau makes sure doors are open using her mind.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris reinvented a better wheel. Summer Glau reinvented a better Chuck Norris.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau just works here. She teaches Chuck Norris how to perform his chores in the best possible manner.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau has a magic mirror in her room which she asks every day "Mirror, mirror on the wall, who's the awesomest of them all?" and if the mirror tells her something else, she destroys it for daring to lie to her.
She’s still using the first mirror.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris shot the sheriff and his deputy. Summer Glau became the new sheriff and shot Chuck Norris.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Summer Glau can kill you with her mind. But she’ll never need to or will.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Chuck Norris does expect the Spanish Inquisition. But he doesn’t expect Summer Glau.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: When wishing to comment on a WordPress blog, Summer Glau finds a new zero-day WordPress SQL injection exploit, and uses it to insert the comment into the database directly, because even she cannot rely on its comment box to work.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: Summer Glau Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #1

body.p: XSLT is the worst thing since non-sliced bread.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #2

body.p: Mothers used to tell their children stories about XSLT to scare them.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #3

body.p: XSLT is the number one cause of programmers' suicides since Visual Basic 1.0.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #4

body.p: The X in XSLT stands for eXtermination.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #5

body.p: The only things worse than XSLT are Excel and Sugar-Less Tea (XSLT).

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #6

body.p: XSLT is what Chuck Norris has nightmares of.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #7

body.p: Confucius says: "XSLT made me realise humanity was hopeless.".

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

body.p: Even APL won't make friends with XSLT.

info.author: Zuu
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #9

body.p: God considered using XSLT as the tenth plague of Egypt, but then thought it was too evil.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #10

body.p: In Soviet Russia, XSLT codes you. Badly!

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #11

body.p: Satan condemned Hitler for a million years of writing XSLT.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #12

body.p: The KGB used to torture their victims by having them look at scrolling XSLT code.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #13

body.p: "My name is Inigo Montoya. You forced my father to write XSLT. Prepare to die! And be thankful I don't force you to write XSLT."

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #14

body.p: Stray XSLT code causes more deaths than road accidents.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #15

body.p: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evil redirects to XSLT.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #16

body.p: We have nothing to fear but fear itself. Fear has nothing to fear but XSLT.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends

meta.title: Shlomif Fish’s "How XSLT is Evil" Facts #17

body.p: The devil created a 10th circle of hell for the inventors of XSLT, because the first nine circles were too mild for them.

info.author: Shlomi Fish
info.work: XSLT Facts by Shlomi Fish and Friends
